src_original: abhimāno 'prāpta uttariviśeṣādhigame prāpto mayeti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /  manuṣyadharmā rāgadveṣamohādayaḥ ,
ūnamāno bahvantaraviśiṣṭāt kulavidyāvittādibhir alpāntarahīno 'smi kulādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /  yuktaṃ tāvat samena samaḥ ,
samānād vā viśiṣṭaḥ ,  viśiṣṭād vā viśiṣṭa ity unnatisthānatvān mānaḥ ,  ātmānaṃ tu nyūnaṃ paśyataḥ kim unnatisthānaṃ ,  yatas tasya māna ucyate /

etad evonnatisthānaṃ bahvantaraviśiṣṭād alpāntarahīno 'smi na yathābahvantarahīnād iti /  api ca santi kecid ye prakṛṣṭe ca sattvarāśau hīnam apy ātmānaṃ bahu manyante /  mithyāmāno 'guṇavato guṇavān asmīti yā cittasyonnatiḥ /
guṇā dānaśīlakṣāntyādayaḥ /  te yasya na vidyante so 'guṇavān /  athavā 'guṇā dauḥśīlyādayaḥ /
te yasya santi so 'guṇavān /
vicikitsā katamā /  satyādiṣu yā vimatir iti /  ādiśabdena karmaphalaratnāni gṛhyante /
dvidhā matir vimatiḥ -- syān na syād [p. 64] iti /
rāgapratighamānāvidyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭir antagrāhadṛṣṭiś ca //
ta ucyante /
vartamānaṃ pratyutpannam ,  nānāgatam atītam vā /  apakāram āgamyety apakāraṃ gṛhītvety anena krodhasya viṣayaṃ nirūpayati /  krodho hy apakāravastuny eva vartamāna eva pravartate ,
cetasa āghāta ity atrāpi vijñānasambandhitvaṃ svarūpaṃ ca nirūpitam /  ayaṃ cāghātasvarūpatvāt pratighān na bhidyate ,  kiṃ tarhi pratighāṃśika eva ,  pratighasyāṃ[p. 65]śe viśeṣe prajñaptatvāt /
vartamānam apakāram adhikṛtya yaś cetasa āghātaḥ sattvāsattvaviṣayo daṇḍādānādisanniśrayadānakarmakaś ca sa krodha iti prajñapyate //
krodhād ūrdhvaṃ mamānenedam apakṛtam ity etasya vairātmakasyāśayasyānubandho 'nutsargaḥ ,  prabandhena pravartanam upanāhaḥ /
akṣānti sanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ /  akṣāntir apakārāmarṣaṇaṃ ,  pratyapakāracikīrṣety arthaḥ /
ayaṃ ca krodhavat pradveṣāvasthāviśeṣe prajñapyata iti prajñaptisan veditavyaḥ //
caṇḍaṃ vacaḥ pragāḍhaṃ pāruṣyaṃ marmaghaṭṭanayogena /  daśanaśīlo dāśī /
tadbhāvo dāśitā /  ayaṃ ca bhāvapratyayaḥ svārthikaḥ /
caṇḍena vacasā [p. 66] pradaśatīti caṇḍavacodāśitā pradāśaḥ /
ayaṃ ca krodhopanāhapūrvaṅgamaś cetasa āghātasvabhāva iti pratighāṃśika eveti na dravyato vidyate /
ayaṃ ca vāgduścaritaprasavanakarmako 'sparśavihārakarmakaś ca /
tadvataḥ pudgalasya duḥsaṃvāsatvāt //
ābhasatkārakulaśīlaśrutādīn guṇān upalabhya dveṣāṃśikaś cetaso vyāroṣa īrṣyā /
svam āśayaṃ vyāpya roṣo vyāroṣaḥ /
daurmanasyasamprayogāt tatpūrvakaś cāsparśavihāra iti daurmanasyāsparśavihārakarmikā //
upāttaṃ vastu dharmāmiṣakauśalātmakaṃ yena pūjānugrahakāmyayārthine 'narthine vā dīyate ,
tad dānam /  tasmin sati dānābhāvāt tadvirodhīty ucyate /
lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya jīvitopakaraṇeṣu rāgāṃśikaś cetasa āgraho 'parityāgecchā mātsaryam /
idaṃ cāsaṃlekhasanniśrayadānakarmakam /
asaṃlekhaḥ punar mātsaryeṇānupayujyamānānām apy upakaraṇānāṃ sannicayād veditavyaḥ //
[p. 67] māyā paravañcanāyā abhūtārthasandarśanā /
lābhasatkārādhyavasitasya paravañcanābhiprāyeṇānyathā vyavasthitasya śīlāder arthasyānyathā prakāśanā /
iyaṃ ca yābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyām abhūtān guṇān prakāśayate tayoḥ samuditayoḥ prajñapyate -- iti krodhādivat prajñaptita eva ,  na dravyataḥ /
mithyājīvasanniśrayadānakarmikā /
svadoṣapracchādanopāyaḥ paravyāmohanam /
tat punar anyenānyat pratisarati kṣipaty aparisphuṭaṃ vā pratipadyate /
ata eva śāṭhyaṃ mrakṣād bhidyate /
idaṃ ca lābhasatkārādhyavasito yābhyāṃ rāgamohābhyāṃ svadoṣapracchādanārthaṃ paramohanāya pravartate ,  tayor eva sahitayos tat prajñapyate /
idaṃ ca saṃyagavavādalābhaparipanthakarmakam /
saṃyagavavāde yo lābho yoniśo manaskāraḥ ,
tasyānta[p. 68]rāyaṃ karotīti //
madaḥ svasampattau raktasyoddharṣaś cetasaḥ paryādānam /
kulārogyarūpayauvanabalaiśvaryabuddhimedhādiprakarṣaḥ svasampattiḥ /
uddharṣo harṣaviśeṣaḥ /

harṣaviśeṣam eva vyācaṣṭe -- cetasaḥ paryādānam iti /  yena harṣaviśeṣeṇa cittam asvatantrīkṛtaṃ tena tad ātmatantrīkaraṇāt paryāttaṃ bhavatītyata uktam -- cetasaḥ paryādānam iti /  eṣa saṅkṣepo harṣaviśeṣasahitas tṛṣṇāprakāro mada iti /
ayaṃ ca sarvakleśopakleśasanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ //
eṣa tu saṅkṣepaḥ -- pratighāṃśikā sattveṣu cittarūkṣatā sattvaviheṭhanakarmikāvihiṃsety ucyate //
[p. 69] nāsya hrīr astīty ahrīḥ /  sa yadyogād evam ucyate ,
hrīvipakṣabhūtaṃ tad āhrīkyam /  tasmin karmaṇy ātmanam ayogyam avekṣyamāṇasyāpi yāvadyenālajjā ,  sāhrīkyam /  apatrapate 'nayety apatrāpyam /  tadviparītam anapatrāpyam /
lokaśāstraviruddham etan mayā kriyata /  ity evam avagacchato 'pi yānayā pāpakriyayālajjā ,  sānapatrāpyam /
etac ca dvayam api sarvakleśopakleśasāhāyyakarmakam /  rāgadveṣamohaprakāreṣu sarvasatkāyaprasavahetuṣu rāgadveṣayor ayaugapadyād yathāsambhavaṃ prajñapyate ,  na svatantre sta iti //
styānaṃ cittākarmaṇyatā /  paryāyāntareṇa vyācaṣṭe -- rstaimityam iti /
stimitabhāvaḥ staimityam ,
yadyogāc cittaṃ jaḍībhāvāt stimitam iva bhavati ,
nālambanaṃ pratipattum utsahate /
etac ca sarvakleśopakleśasāhāyyakarmakam /
mohāṃśe prajñaptatvāc ca prajñaptita eva ,  na dravyataḥ //
aśraddhadhānasya prayogacchandābhāvāt kausīdyasanniśrayadānakarmakatvam //
kuśale kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmaṇi nidrāpārśvaśayanasukham āgamya yo mohāṃśikaś cetaso 'nabhyutsāhaḥ ,
sa kausīdyam /  kutsitaṃ sīdatīti kusīdaḥ /  vīryavipakṣaḥ /  vīryavipakṣa iti /  vīryaṃ hi kuśalapakṣaprayoge cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ ,  tadvipakṣatvāt kausīdyam /
etac ca kuśalapakṣaprayogaparipanthakarmakam //
[p. 71] lobhadveṣamohakausīdyeṣu pramādaḥ prajñapyate ,  yathāvyākhyāteṣu /
ayaṃ cākuśalavṛddhikuśalaparihāṇisaṃniśrayadānakarmakaḥ //
muṣitasmṛtitā kliṣṭā smṛtiḥ /
iyaṃ ca vikṣepasanniśrayadānakarmikā //
vividhaṃ kṣipyate 'nena cittam iti vikṣepaḥ /
yai rāgadveṣamohaiś cittaṃ samādhyālambanād bahir visāryate ,  teṣu yathāsambhavam upakleśātmako vikṣepaḥ prajñapyate /
eṣa ca vairāgyaparipanthakarmakaḥ //
asamprajanyaṃ kleśasamprayuktā prajñā /
yayāsamviditā kāyavākcittacaryābhikramapratikramādiṣu pravartate /
karaṇīyākaraṇīyājñānāc cāpattisanniśrayadānakarmakam /  kaukṛtyaṃ cetaso vipratisāraḥ /
kutsitaṃ kṛtam iti kukṛtam /  tadbhāvaḥ kaukṛtyam /

kukṛtaviṣayaś cetaso vilekhaḥ kaukṛtyam [p. 72] ucyate ,  caitasikādhikārāt /  abhipretam anabhipretaṃ kuśalam akuśalam avyākṛtaṃ kāle 'kāle yuktam ayuktaṃ ca kṛtvākṛtvā vā mohāṃśikaś cetaso vipratisāraḥ kaukṛtyam /
tac ca cittasthitiparipanthakarmakam /

sāsvatantrā cetaso yato bhavati ,  tan middham /  kāyasandhāraṇāsamarthā vā vṛttiś cetaso 'svatantrā ,  tan middham /  anyato 'py asvatantrā vṛttiś cetaso bhavatīty ata āha -- cetaso 'bhisaṅkṣepa iti /  anyato 'py abhisaṅkṣepaś cetasa ity asvatantravṛttiś cetasa ity āha /
abhisaṅkṣepaś cetasaś cakṣurādīndriyadvāreṇāpravṛttiḥ /
kṛtyātipattisanniśrayadānakarmakam /  atra cākuśala eva mohāṃśikaḥ ,  nānyaḥ //
vitarkaḥ paryeṣako manojalpaś cetanāprajñāviśeṣaḥ /  paryeṣakaḥ kim etad iti nirūpaṇākārapravṛttaḥ /
manaḥsvabhāvo jalpo manojalpaḥ /
jalpa iva jalpo 'rthakathanam /
cetanāprajñāviśeṣa iti cetanāyāś cittaparispandātmakatvāt prajñāyāś ca guṇadoṣavivekākāratvāt /
tadvaśena cittapravṛtteḥ kadāciccittacetanayor vitarkaprajñaptiḥ ,  kadācit prajñācetasoḥ ,  yathākramam abhyūhānabhyūhāvasthāyoḥ /  athavā cetanāprajñayor eva vitarkaprajñaptiḥ ,
tad evam ālayavijñānaṃ dviprakāram /  niṣyandavāsanām upādāya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca /
nākāraḥ /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
yasmād ālayavijñānaṃ dvābhyām ālambanābhyāṃ pravartate /  adhyātmam upādānavijñaptitaḥ ,  bahirdhāparicchinnākārabhājanavijñaptitaś ca /
tatrādhyātmam upādānaṃ parikalpitasvabhāvābhiniveśavāsanā sādhiṣṭhānaṃ cendriyarūpam /
tasya punaḥ pravṛttir nikāyasabhāgāntareṣu pratisandhiḥ /
nivṛttiḥ sopadhiśeṣo nirupadhiśeṣaś ca nirvāṇadhātuḥ /
tatrālayavijñānānabhyupagame saṃskārapratyayavijñānābhāvāt saṃsārapravṛttir na yujyate /
ālayavijñānānabhyupagame hi pratisandhivijñānaṃ vā saṃskārapratyayaṃ parikalpyeta ,  saṃskāraparibhāvitā vā ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥ saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam /
tatra na pratisandhivijñānaṃ pūrvajanmopacitasaṃskārapratyayam ,
pūrvajanmopacitasaṃskārāṇāṃ ciraniruddhatvāt ,
niruddhasya cāsattvāt ,
asataś ca pratyayābhāvāt /  yadi niruddhasya pratyayatvaṃ neṣyate ,  evaṃ ca saty aphalam eva karma syāt ,  na hi vartamānāt karmaṇo vipāko nirvartate /  naitad evam ,
na kevalaṃ vijñānam /  tatra vijñānam eva saṃskārapratyayam ,  na ca nāmarūpam iti kātra yuktiḥ /
tasmāt saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam iti vaktavyam ,
na tu vijñānam iti /
[p. 103] katamad vānyad vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam /
tasya prātisandhikān nāmarūpāt ka ātmātiśayo yatas tad eva vijñānapratyayaṃ na pūrvam /
pūrvaṃ ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nottaram ity ataś ca saṃskārapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam evāstu /  kiṃ pratisandhivijñānenāṅgāntareṇa parikalpitena /

tasmān na pratisandhivijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayaṃ yujyate /  saṃskārās tv avidyāpratyayāḥ /  tadadhivāsitaṃ ca vijñānaṃ saṃskārapratyayam /  tatpratyayaṃ pratisandhau ca nāmarūpam evety eṣaiva nītir niravadyā /
ṣaḍvijñānakāyāḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitāḥ saṃskārapratyayam vijñānam ity ayam api pakṣo durghaṭita eva /
kiṃ kāraṇam /
na hi vijñānaṃ vipākavāsanāṃ niṣyandavāsanāṃ vātmany ādhātuṃ samartham ,
ātmani kāritravirodhāt /
nāpy anantare ,
tasya tadānutpannatvād anutpannasya cāsattvāt /
pūrvasya tadā niruddhatvāt /
acittakāsu ca middhādyavasthāsu punaḥ saṃskāraparibhāvitacittotpattyasambhavād vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ na syāt /
tadabhāvāt ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na syāt /
evaṃ yāvaj jarāmaraṇaṃ na syāt /
saṃsāranivṛttir apy ālayavijñāne 'sati nopapadyate /
saṃsārasya hi karmakleśāḥ kāraṇam /
tayoḥ kleśāḥ pra[p. 104]dhānam /
tathā hi kleśādhipatyāt karma punarbhavākṣepasamarthaṃ bhavati ,  nānyathā /
evaṃ ca pradhānatvāt kleśā eva saṃsārapravṛtter mūlam /
atas teṣu prahīṇeṣu saṃsāro nivartate ,  nānyathā /
na cālayavijñānam antareṇa tatprahāṇaṃ yujyate /
sammukhībhūto vā kleśaḥ prahīyeta ,  bījāvastho vā /
tatra sammukhībhūtaḥ prahīyata ity aniṣṭir eveyam ,  tadā tatprahāṇamārgābhāvāt /  bījāvastho 'pi naiva prahīyate ,  na hi pratipakṣāt tadānīṃ kiñcid anyad abhyupagamyate ,
yatra kleśabījaṃ vyavasthitaṃ tatpratipakṣeṇa prahīyeta /

na hi kleśabījānuṣaktam eva tatpratipakṣo yujyate /  na cāprahīṇakleśabījānāṃ saṃsāravinivṛttiḥ sambhavatīti tasmād avaśyam ālayavijñānaṃ tadanyavijñānasahabhūtaiḥ kleśopakleśair bhāvyate svabījapuṣṭyādhānata ity upeyam /  punaś ca tata eva santatipariṇāmaviśeṣād yathābalaṃ bhāvanāvṛttilābhe sati kleśopakleśāḥ pravartante /
teṣāṃ [p. 105] cālayavijñānavyavasthitaṃ bījaṃ tatsahabhuvā kleśapratipakṣamārgeṇāpanīyate /
tasmiṃś cāpanīte punas tenāśrayeṇa kleśānām anutpattir iti sopadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ prāpyate /  pūrvakarmākṣiptajanmanirodhe ca tato 'nyajanmāpratisandhānān nirupadhiśeṣo nirvāṇadhātuḥ /
sādṛśyenendriyaṃ spṛśatīndriyeṇa vā spṛśyata iti sparśaḥ /
vedanāsanniśrayatvam asya karma /
evaṃ hy uktaṃ sūtre -- sukhavedanīyaṃ sparśaṃ pratītyotpadyate sukhā vedaneti //
manaskāraḥ katamaḥ /  cetasa ābhoga iti /
ābhujanam ābhoga /
ālambane yena cittam abhimukhīkriyate ,  sa cittasyābhogaḥ /  sa punar ālambane cittadhāraṇakarmakaḥ /
cittadhāraṇaṃ punas tatraivālambane punaḥ punaścittasyāvarjanam /  etac ca karma cittasantater ālambananiyamena viśiṣṭaṃ manaskāram adhikṛtyoktam ,
abhiprete vastuny abhilāṣa ity /  abhipretagrahaṇam anabhiprete chandābhāvajñāpanārtham /  evaṃ ca cchandasya pratiniyataviṣayatvaṃ jñāpitam bhavati /

darśanaśravaṇādikriyāviṣayatvena yad abhimataṃ vastu tad abhipretam /  tatra darśanaśravaṇābhilāṣaḥ prārthanā /  yady abhilāṣātmakaś chandaḥ ,  tṛṣṇāchandayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ /  tṛṣṇā[p. 37]abhiṣvaṅgalakṣaṇā /
sa ca vīryārambhasanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ ///
adhimokṣaḥ katamaḥ /  niścite vastuni tathaivāvadhāraṇam iti niścitagrahaṇam /
na hy aniścite vastuni tathaivāvadhāraṇasambhavo 'stīti /  yuktita āptopadeśād vā yad vastu niḥsandigdhaṃ tan niścitam /
yenaivākāreṇa tan niścitam anityaduḥkhādyākāreṇa ,  tenaivākāreṇa tadvastunaś cetasi niveśanam evam evaitan nānyathety avadhāraṇam adhimokṣaḥ /
sa cāsaṃhāryatākarmakaḥ /
adhimuktipradhāno hi svasiddhāntāt parapravādibhir apahartuṃ na śakyate /
smṛtiḥ katamā /  saṃstute vastuny asampramoṣaś cetaso 'bhilapanateti /  saṃstuta ity asaṃstute smṛtyabhāvapradarśanārtham /
saṃstutaṃ ca vastu pūrvānubhūtam /
asampramoṣa ālambanagrahaṇāvipraṇāśakāraṇam /
tat pūrvagṛhītasya vastunaḥ punaḥ punar ālambanākārasmaraṇam abhilapanatā /  abhilapanam [p. 38] ivābhilapanam ,  abhilapanam evābhilapanatā /
sā punar ālambanābhilapane sati na cittasyālambanāntare ākārāntare vā vikṣepo bhavatīty ato 'vikṣepakarmikā //
samādhiḥ katamaḥ /  upaparīkṣye vastuni cittasyaikāgrateti /  upaparīkṣya iti nānyatra /  evaṃ ca samādheḥ pratiniyataviṣayatvam uktaṃ bhavati /
upaparīkṣye vastuni guṇato doṣato vā /
cittasyaikāgrateti ekālambanatā /
ñānasanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ ,  samāhite citte yathābhūtaparijñānāt /
pravicinotīti pravicayaḥ /
saṃyag mithyā vā saṅkīrṇasvasāmānyalakṣaṇeṣv iva dharmeṣu vivekāvabodhaḥ /
yuktir yogaḥ -- āptopadeśo 'numānam pratyakṣaṃ ca /
tena triprakāreṇa yo janitaḥ sa yogavihitaḥ /
sa punaḥ śrutamayaś cintāmayo bhāvanāmayaś ca /
tatrāptavacanaprāmāṇyajo 'vabodhaḥ śrutamayaḥ /
yuktinidhyānajaś cintāmayaḥ /
samādhijo bhāvanāmayaḥ /
ayogaḥ punar anāptopadeśo 'numānābhāsomithyāpraṇihitaś ca samādhiḥ /

tena yo janitaḥ so 'yogavihitaḥ /  tatra sāṅkhyavaiśeṣikādīnāṃ śrutamayaś cintāmayaś cānāptopadeśajanitatvāt kutarkajanitatvād ayogavihitaḥ /  vītarāgānāṃ tu śāśvatocchedavādinām ekatyaśāśvatikādīnāṃ ca mithyāpraṇihitasamādhijanitatvād ayogavihitaḥ /
upapattipratilambhiko laukikavyavahārāvabodhaś ca naiva yogavihito nāyogavihitaḥ /
eṣa ca saṃśayavyāvartanakarmakaḥ /
saṃśayavyāvartanaṃ tu prajñayā dharmān pravicinvato niścayalābhāt //
śraddhā hi trividhā pravartate /

sati vastuni guṇavaty aguṇavati vā sampratyayākārā ,  sati guṇavati ca prasādākārā ,  sati guṇavati ca prāptum utpādayituṃ śakye 'bhilāṣākārā /  nanvevam abhilāṣākāratvāt tṛṣṇācchandayor anyatarā bhavati /  naitad evam /  kuśalaviṣayatvān na tṛṣṇā ,
śraddhāpūrvakatvāc chandasya na cchandaḥ /  cetasaḥ prasāda iti /

śraddhā hi cittakāluṣyavairodhikīty atas tatsamprayoge kleśopakleśamalakāluṣyavigamāc cittaṃ śraddhām āgamya prasīdatīti cetasaḥ prasāda ucyate  udakaprasādakamaṇisthānīyaṃ dharmāntaraṃ caitasikaṃ śraddhā ,  na rūpaprasādātmiketi pradarśanārtham āha -- cetasaḥ prasāda iti /  cetasaḥ prasādo ,  na rūpasyeti /
sā punaś chandasanniśrayadānakarmikā //
hrīḥ katamā /
ātmānaṃ dharmaṃ vādhipatiṃ kṛtvāvadyena lajjā /

yatpratibaddhā yasya kriyāsu pravṛttir nivṛttir vā sa tasyādhipatiḥ svā[p. 44]mītyarthaḥ /  ātmānaṃ dharmaṃ vādhipatiṃ svāminaṃ kṛtvā /  sadbhir vigarhitatvād aniṣṭavipākatvāc ca pāpam evāvadyam /  tenāvadyena kṛtenākṛtena vā cittasyāvalīnatā lajjā /  kulajñānādibhir guṇaiḥ pāpakriyāyām ātmānam ayogyaṃ matvā ,
dharme 'py etad aniṣṭavipākatvāt paropaghātapravṛttatvāc ca garhitam -- ity evaṃ yātmānaṃ dharmaṃ cāvekṣamāṇasyāvadyena lajjā ,  sā hrīḥ /
iyaṃ ca duścaritasaṃyamanasanniśrayadānakarmikā //
apatrāpyaṃ katamat /  lokam adhipatiṃ kṛtvāvadyena lajjā /  loke hy etad garhitam ,
māṃ caivaṅkarmāṇaṃ viditvā vigarhiṣyantīty aślokādibhayād avadyena lajjate /

idam api duścaritasaṃyamanasanniśrayadānakarmakam eva /  duścaritād viratiḥ saṃyamanam /  lajjamānasyāpatrapamāṇasya vā kṛte 'pi duścarite 'vaśyaṃ tadviramaṇād anayos ta[p. 45]tsanniśrayadānakarmakatvam //  alobha iti /  ayam akāras triṣv artheṣu vartate /

abhāve /  'nyasmin pratipakṣe ca /  atra pratipakṣa eva vartate nānyasmin nābhāva iti pradarśanārtham āha -- lobhapratipakṣa iti /  evam adveṣe amohe ca vaktavyam /  nirvid anāgraha iti tatsvarūpanirūpaṇam /
lobho nāma bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca āsaktiḥ prārthanā ca /
tatpratipakṣo 'lobho bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu cānāsaktir vaimukhyaṃ ca /  nirvid bhavabhogādīnavānāṃ parijñānād bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca vaimukhyam /
anāgraho bhavabhavabhogayor asaktiḥ /  athavānāgrahaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ nirvidgrahaṇaṃ -- bhave bhavopakaraṇeṣu ca vaimukhyākāro yo 'nāgraho 'yam alobha iti /
ayaṃ ca duścaritāpravṛttisanniśrayadānakarmaka iti //
adveṣaḥ katamaḥ /  dveṣapratipakṣo maitrī /
dveṣo hi sattveṣu duḥkhe duḥkhasthānīyeṣu ca dharmeṣv āghātaḥ /
tatpratipakṣo 'nāghātaḥ /  dveṣasyānye 'pi pratipakṣāḥ santīty ata āha -- maitrī /  maitrātmako dveṣasya yaḥ pratipakṣaḥ so 'dveṣaḥ ,  nānya iti /
ayam api duścaritāpravṛttisa[p. 46]nniśrayadānakarmaka iti //
amohaḥ katamaḥ /  mohapratipakṣo bhūtasampratipattiḥ /
ata evāmoho duścaritāpravṛttisanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ //
vīryaṃ katamat /  kausīdyapratipakṣaḥ kuśale cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ /

kliṣṭe tūtsāhaḥ kutsitatvāt kausīdyam eva /  nanu ca kliṣṭaṃ svabhyastatvāt svarasenaiva pravartate /  kiṃ tatrotsāhena /  prāyeṇaivam ,  asti tu kiñcid yatrotsāho 'py apekṣyate /  tat punar yatsamprayogāt sannāhe prayoge vālīnatve vāvyāvṛttau vāsantuṣṭau vā kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ ,  tad vīryam /
kuśalapakṣaparipūraṇapariniṣpādanakarmakam /  pariniṣpādanaṃ tasyaiva parikarmakṛtatvam //
prasrabdhiḥ katamā /  dauṣṭhulyapratipakṣaḥ kāyacittakarmaṇyatā /
dauṣṭhulyaṃ kāyacittayor akarmaṇyatā sāṅkleṣikadharmabījāni ca /
tadapagame prasrabdhisadbhāvād dauṣṭhulyapratipakṣaḥ /

lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasrabdheḥ kāyacittakarmaṇyatā /  tatra kāyakarmaṇyatā kāyasya svakāryeṣu laghusamutthānatā yato bhavati /  cittakarmaṇyatā samyaṅmanasikāraprayuktasya hlādalāghavanimittaṃ yac caitasikaṃ dharmāntaram /
tadyogāc cittam asaktam ālambane pravartata ity atas tac cittakarmaṇyatety ucyate /
kāya[p. 48]sya punaḥ spraṣṭavyaviśeṣa eva prītyāhṛtaḥ kāyaprasrabdhir veditavyā /
prītamanasaḥ kāyaḥ prasrabhyata iti sūtre vacanāt /
iyaṃ ca tadbalenāśrayaparāvṛttito 'śeṣakleśādyāvaraṇaniṣkarṣaṇakarmikā //
tato 'nabhisaṃskāreṇāprayatnena samāhitasya cetaso yathāyogaṃ samasyaiva pravṛttiḥ praśaṭhatā /
sā punar avasthā layauddhatyāśaṅkānugatā ,  acirabhāvitatvāt /

tato bhāvanāprakarṣagamanāt tadvipakṣadūrībhāvāt tacchaṅkābhāve layauddhatyapratipakṣani[p. 50]mitteṣv ābhogam akurvato 'nābhogāvasthatā cittasyānābhogatā  yayā nirvāsiteṣu kliṣṭeṣu dharmeṣv iti /  yayety upekṣaiva sambadhyate /

kliṣṭā dharmā rāgādisahitāḥ /  teṣāṃ nirvāsanaṃ punar anutpattiḥ /  upekṣā hi saṅkliṣṭavihāravairodhikīty avaśyaṃ tayā rāgādipravṛttivibandhe vartitavyam ity atas tayā nirvāsiteṣv ity uktam /  yataś ca saṅkliṣṭena vihāreṇopekṣā virūdhyate ,  tenopekṣāvihāry asaṅkliṣṭavihārī bhavatīti /  ataś copekṣā saṅkleśānavakāśasanniśrayadānakarmikā //
avihiṃsā katamā /  vihiṃsāpratipakṣaḥ karuṇeti /
vadhabandhādibhir aviheṭhanam adrohaṇaṃsattvānām avihiṃseti vihiṃsāpratipakṣaḥ /
kaṃ ruṇaddhīti karuṇā /  kam iti sukhasyākhyā /  sukhaṃ ruṇaddhīty arthaḥ /  kāruṇiko hi paraduḥkhaduḥkhī bhavatīti /
sa punar duḥkhasañjananakarmakaḥ /
triduḥkhatāyogād yathāsambhavaṃ traidhātukāḥ pañca skandhā duḥkham abhipretam tasya ca duḥkhasya kāmarūpārūpyatṛṣṇāvaśenābhinirvṛttito rāgasya duḥkhasañjananaṃ karma nirdiśyate //
pratighaḥ katamaḥ /
sattveṣv āghāta iti /
āghātaḥ sattveṣu rūkṣacittatā yenāviṣṭaḥ sattvānāṃ vadhabandhādikam anarthaṃ cintayati /
sa punar asparśavihāraduścaritasanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ /
sparśaḥ sukham /
tena sahito vihāraḥ sparśavihāraḥ /
duḥkhasahita ity arthaḥ /
āghātacittasyāvaśyaṃ daurmanasyasamudācārāc [p. 52] cittaṃ tapyate /  cittānuvidhānāc ca kāyo 'pi tapyata eveti /  sarveryāpatheṣu saduḥkhasavighāto 'sya vihāro bhavati /
pratihatacittasya ca na kiñcid duścaritaṃ vidūr -- iti pratigho 'sparśavihāraduścaritasanniśrayadānakarmaka uktaḥ //
māno hi sarva eva satkāyadṛṣṭisanniśrayeṇa pravartate ,  cittasya connatilakṣaṇaḥ /
tathā hy ātmātmīyabhāvaṃ skandheṣv adhyāropyāyam aham idaṃ mamety ātmānaṃ tena tena viśeṣeṇonnamayati anyebhyo 'dhikaṃ manyate /
sa cāgauravaduḥkhotpattisanniśrayadānakarmakaḥ /
agauravaṃ guruṣu guṇavatsu ca pudgaleṣu stabdhatā kāyavācor apasṛtatā /
duḥkhotpattiḥ punar atra punarbhavotpattir veditavyā /
sa punaś cittonnatisvabhāvābhede 'pi cittonnatinimittabhedāt saptadhā bhidyate -- māno 'timāna ity evamādi //
hīnāt kulavijñānavittādibhiḥ śreyān asmi kulavijñānavittādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,
sadṛśena vā kulādibhis tair eva sadṛśo 'smīti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,

atimānaḥ kulavijñānavittādibhiḥ sadṛśāt tyāgaśīlapauruṣādibhiḥ śreyān a[p. 53]smi ,  śreyasā vā kulavittādibhiḥ sadṛśo 'smi vijñānavittādibhir iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,  ayam atimāna iti /  mānātimānaḥ śreyasaḥ kulavijñānavittair aham eva śreyān kulavijñānavittair iti yā cittasyonnatiḥ ,
ayaṃ mānātimānaḥ /

asmimānaḥ pañcopādānaskandhān iti /  chandarāgau hy atropādānam /  anāgatātmabhāvābhilāṣaś chandaḥ /  vartamānādhyavasānaṃ rāgaḥ /  tatrānāgatātmabhāvaṃ chandamukhenopādatte /  vartamānaskandhān rāgamukhenāparityāgata upādatte /  ata etad eva dvayamupādānam ity ucyate /
tena yuktāḥ skandhā upādānaskandhāḥ /  teṣūpādānaskandheṣv ātmātmīyarahiteṣv ātmātmīyābhiniveśād yā cittasyonnatir ,
ayam asmimānaḥ /
